name: Super Momotarou Dentetsu DX
overview: Super Momotarou Dentetsu DX ("Super Peach Boy Electric Railway Deluxe") is a multiplayer board game that concerns electric railways and transport and is part of the Momotarou Dentetsu series from Hudson that began as a punnish spin-off of their Momotarou Densetsu games and quickly surpassed it in popularity. DX is the fourth Momotarou Dentetsu game for Super Famicom and once again expands the world to include new stations, new rules and new events.
